title: League crashing
body: Out of no where me and a friend both had our league crash 10 minutes apart. That's never or rarely happened to me before.

replies.body: When you say crash, what do you mean exactly?  Is it happening in-game and does it completely shut the game off?  Do you receive any error messages and what does it say?  Looking forward to helping out!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YW6rgZkV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T16:44:58.999+0000)
>
> When you say crash, what do you mean exactly?  Is it happening in-game and does it completely shut the game off?  Do you receive any error messages and what does it say?  Looking forward to helping out!

It happens in the client while in queue or champ select, the entire thing shuts off with no warning or message.

It's tough to say what's going on since there's no error message, but based on what you've explained I've got a good feeling that there is an issue with your network.  If you've lost connection in champion select, I can see the termination just closing out without a response.  Luckily, our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) can provide a series of steps to get you back in good health.  I hope that helps!
